name: Orchestra Vivace
description:
Become part of the living orchestra and feel the wild rhythm of the music. Can you find your way through the chaotic mess of rampaging instruments, and collect all six crosses?

Controls

Move - W, A, S, D

Jump - Space

Camera - Mouse

Best played via downloaded standalone

Credits

This game was created as a 2 month university project by:

  • The Fifth King / Discord: The Fifth King#0005 / Programming and Design
  • Pandorai / Discord: Pandorai#4259 / Programming and Design
